case.state: I am Laevatein... my blade shares my name.
(Is that girl... walking out of a portal? It's as if she was being summoned!)
My orders are to learn more about emotions. This game though... could it help? Well, it doesnâ€™t matter. No matter the order, I shall carry it out.
Princess Sharana recommended this game to me. She told me that this game can stir a myriad of emotions within me. I would like to experience that.
I will greet you all as I have been taught to do...Hello.
I should be fine with these...
Let's just stick with these,
Dealer, I'll only need one
All I need is one.
Will one be enough?
I'll take ~cards~.
I've never been good at strategy.
(Which ones to keep?)
(I must not be reckless. ...That's what Laegjarn would say.)
It's easier to choose a weapon than cards...
(Why would I come to a place like this?)
Three is a powerful number, even in poker it seems.
I have received two of the same card. What is the meaning of this?
Safe...for at least a little longer.
Beginner's luck I guess.
I have never played poker, but it seems simple enough.
This hand is good, Laevatein is better.
Leagjarn, my sister, explained the basic rules of poker to me. She knows everything.
This will keep me safe. I think.
Hmm. ~Player~, could you give me some poker advice?
I can win with these...Or at least I hope so.
I can't lose with these.
I-I am starting to understand... what will let me win.
I-Is anyone else feeling d--distracted?
Right, cards! Focus...on the cards.
phew...
Every victory brings me... relief.
This beach... it feels strangely nostalgic
Summer...Is the best season.
This hand is decent. Not bad, not great.
Day and night I was forced to train. I don't remember when it started.
It's hard to pay attention to both the conversation and these cards, but I will try.
I'm sure Loki would enjoy seeing me like this.
(Nothing could have prepared me for this...)
Are these good or bad? I can't tell with all these distractions!
(If I could just be with her again, I could be happy.)
Sorry if I react...strangely, my sister attempted to keep me away from nudity growing up.
I have no affection towards my home, and yet I am tasked with rebuilding it.
My sister is clever, she could have done something with this hand.
My sister is clever, she could tell what you are planning.
(I cannot drop my guard.)
D-Do not toy with me, dealer! I could cut you down.
I-I feel strange ... It is interfering.
Do you want me to sink further, Dealer!?
Not now!
Hmph! Do you bear a grudge for some reason?
I do not care for leaving my fate up to luck.
I'm skilled with blades, not cards!
( Just re-remember the rules and you'll be fine)
I-It's unfair that the dealer does not strip as well. O-Or is that uncommon?
I-I must train harder... at poker.
Who is this "professor" person you keep muttering about? Someone important, I assume?
(Hmm, is there anyone who goes by professor in the Order of Heroes?)
I can understand being attached to one's weapon. Me and my blade share a name.
I am the same. I've trained with many weapons, yet I'd feel uneasy without Laevatein by my side.
We share similar fighting styles, Jason. I prefer a blade to a bow.
We fight similarly, Jason. I am better with a sword than the bow.
Another kingdom---Embla---was responsible for closing them. If one kingdom held both powers. It would have stopped much fighting.
The kingdom of Embla held the duty of closing. Yet, they show only hostility to Askr. If one could do both, fighting could have been avoided.
It is... alright. We were enemies. It was smart to not be to... trusting.
It is... fine. We were once enemies. It is wise to not be so trusting at first.
I could see how that could be a nuisance. However the power to enter other worlds is... extraordinary
The power to enter other worlds is... extraordinary. I was not expecting you to be so... flippant about it.
N-Never mind, I was not thinking when I said that. H-How could we even start with that?
N-No. We could... not do that. I spoke thoughtlessly. H-How could we even start?

condition.saying: (I could look cute in a bodysuit like that... but... was I hoping she wasn't wearing underwear...?)

case.state: W-Why are you staring at me like that... do you want something?

condition.saying: Well, some people get rather scared when I'm around and my goth-y clubmate isn't. So I have to be scarier than her, and she can be a little creepy.

case.state: I see, so it is a competition of strength between you and this "gothy friend".
Ah, you'd earn your title by being more frightful then your friend. I understand,
W-Well... no one's talked to me... like that before. But when I am idle, my thoughts usually drift to my sister. C-Could that help?
U-Um... I have little experience with... such matters. But I believe I would enjoy if they were... very direct about what they wished from me...

condition.saying: You better be careful, then! Just because you've got a high armor class doesn't mean I can't beat your will save!

case.state: Hm. If that is a challenge, know that I will not go down without a fight.

condition.saying: Laevy, what are you talking about? You're awesome! Of course I'm going to be excited. Plus, you'd pull off the uniform look well, I think!

case.state: O-Oh I am... glad you enjoy my presence... I don't understand it, but I do not dislike it.
I am... happy you enjoy my presence. Even if this feeling is... new to me, I do not dislike it.

condition.saying: Well... they're right there and... v-very attractive...

case.state: A-Ah, I forgot that m-my bodysuit is transparent... S-So you can see... them.
I suppose... I do not dislike it.
I suppose... I could get used to it.
Oh, I see. So it is similar to a play. I have little experience with those.
W-Well, thank you. This armour was hard earned.
That sounds... interesting. Perhaps it's similar to donning an outfit for the new year, or for going to the beach.
That is... interesting. However I don't think there are many who'd want to make a replica of my attire.
T-Thank you... a-accepting help... is not an easy thing.
Y-Yes, I have learned that, and yet I still go to my old beliefs at times...
We're... friends? I have learned that trusting allies... is not weakness. Yet it is still hard to change.
Fighting... I am skilled at that. I'd like to try it, but I wonder how it would compare to real fighting.
W-Wait, she fainted!? I-I've never had someone react li-like that!
(Jura raises a good point. Would that be a strategy my sister would use?)
I-I've never been good at strategy. I just left it to my sister. But she's gone now.
What is a "cosplay"? Is it similar to the plays I've heard are performed in Askr?
I do not understand what cosplay is? Is it anything like a play?
Muspell is a land covered in flames, and my homeland.
Muspell is a land of fire. And where I grew up.
(Approach others....) Perhaps that is what I am missing.
Approaching others... perhaps that is why the princess told me to come here.
I... can understand that. Just remembering her... hurts the most.
Yes, I can understand. It... hurts to remember a loved one gone.
Hmph. I am not partial to those who would use words to cover their true intentions
Hm, I dislike those who use words to muddy what they truly believe.
Th-thank you, but your... pity is not needed.
I-I do not need your... pity. I will be fine.

condition.saying: R-really? You think I'm hot? S-sure, people have called me... n-nevermind! T-thank you! (Someone who's hot thinks I'm hot! It's just science at this point!)

case.state: O-of course... "hot" is a compliment, correct? You look quite... happy to hear it.
Y-yes... I believe "hot" is a compliment, yes? It seems to make you...happy to hear it.
That uniform, it's a Pegasus knight's. But what army do you belong to?
I recognize that armour as that of a Pegasus knight's. But I do not recognize what army you fight for.
I don't think I've ever talked this much about myself before, Jessie.
I don't think anyone has ever has asked this much about me before, Jessie.
Lord Surtr is dead, Hero. I am here on my own volition.
No, Lord Surtr is dead so I have no reason to oppose you. I came here for my own reasons.
Muspell has little water. Seeing so much in one place is still surprising.
There are no beaches in Muspell. Its vastness still dazes me slightly.
Ah, you practice music? That may be useful if any of us fall tired.
I have respect for musicians. Their services are always welcome on the battlefield.
(Why are there more women than men. Is that normal?)
(T-There's only women!?) Th-this is different then how I was told it was going to be.
Watch ~leader~. Sticking to the strong is the only way to survive.
To think for myself, I'll need it with these cards.
If cards can teach me how to think or live for myself, then I owe it to myself to give it a chance.
I may ask some...strange questions, it's just because I'm trying to learn.
Be it in battle or in cards, the strong thrive.
I was taught not to think, but to act. I hope it shall be a boon rather than a bane.
Being here with Laevatein...It calms my nerves.
It's warm here, warmer than Askr anyway.
No matter the outcome, my blade shall not leave my side. We share a name, we are inseparable.
I apologize if I sound... uninterested. I'm not; i-it's just that talking... is difficult for me.
Do... most people play this kind of game?
(This heat inside, it feels different? I-is it love?)
(Am I still trying to learn? O-Or am I just enjoying this? Either way I do not dislike this.)
I used to go weeks without saying a word. I guess I'm making up for lost time here.
I-I wish I was more like my sister, kind and thoughtful.
Indeed. You seem to understand what it's like.
Yes. It seems you are quick to grasp what I mean.
It's Lae-va-tane. I would appreciate if you would say it correctly.
Disrespecting my name is the same as disrespecting my weapon. So I would appreciate if you would say it right!
Oh, you're back. D-Don't make me worry about you again.
Welcome back. I would appreciate it if I did not have to worry about you again.
It is the armour of a general of Muspell. Wearing it is a show of my strength.
My armour is that of a Muspellian general. It displays the strength I have used to earn it.
However... I now work to complete the last order she gave me. To live and think for myself...
Yes... I have a goal now. My sister's last order was for me to live for myself. I will achieve that.
(Petra and Hilda... those names sound familiar. How do I know them?)
Something like that. I have tried other weapons when the situation called for it.
Indeed. Although I have used other weapons before. I even tried magic once.
I see. So you are the... leader of this "Planeptune"?
So, you are the leader of "Planeptune" right?
Before, every day was just more fighting. I have opened my eyes to more options now.
Before every day brought only more fighting, Now I have learned... more, such as swimming. I still enjoy training though.
If you must, but I would appreciate if you said it correctly. Also, what is a "lava lamp"?
It's Lay-va-tein. But if you must use a nickname, apply it to my weapon as well.
I'm not too partial to any nickname. But if you must, call my blade the same.
I have trained with many weapons, but I enjoy my sword the most.
I'll always use my sword when I can. We are inseparable.
Yes, me and my blade share our name. We are one and the same.
Indeed, we are both lethal tools. It makes sense we share a name.
O-Oh, thank you. But my armour is hot, not cool.
Well, th-thank you. I do not think my armour would be cool though.
I've never been one for history. But I think it was due to our creator: the flame dragon Muspell.
I've never cared for history. But I remember my sister saying it was an ability the flame dragon Muspell, gave us.
I-I do not think I chose to become a soldier. Yet it is something I've always done.
... Not really. Fighting just became natural to me. A part of daily life.
No, I was just told where to fight... and I fought.
I see... Me laughing definitely surprise my soldiers.
Interesting, I had not considered how opening up could affect combat ability.
I see... me laughing would be a shock for my soldiers. Although perhaps for the wrong reasons.
No. Muspell has little more than flames and brimstone.
I don't think so. Muspell is a land covered with flame. You cannot do much but survive there.
When I'm not busy? Well, either I am training, or... learning how to "live".
My responsibilities keep me busy for the most part. But when I can, I try activities that can teach me how to "live". Such as this.
Th-Thank you... you are right that much work went into this armour's creation. But... what is a "Toucannon"?
Thanks... it is true that my armour required great effort, but I would not know what a Toucannon is.
When great powers use their strength without considering their effects, they will fall. It's a lesson I know well.
When someone uses their strength without consideration, it will be their downfall. That is something I have learned.
So even loss... can bring people closer
So even loss... can bring people together.
It is a rare metal which can only be found in Muspell. It is... nice that you noticed.
It is made of a metal only found in Muspell. You... have a good eye for noticing it.
Hm? Yes, I do not think I am able to change my hair's colour.
Of course, I do not know of a method to change my hair's colour, even if I wanted to.

condition.saying: Hey... your outfit's really cool. What was your name, again? Laevy... Lava... time? Are you cosplaying a hero?

case.state: "Cosplay"...? I'm not familiar with the term. But if it concerns Heroes, you may be correct.
"Cosplay"? I do not know it's meaning. Yet... if it pertains to Heroes, I may understand

condition.saying: Huh. So... do they keep your wig on...? Your hairpieces. I wouldn't want to break character either.

case.state: ...Of course I keep my hair on, I cannot take it off. I don't see what that has to do with who I am.

condition.saying: H-how'd you get into good shape for that outfit, anyway? People always make fun of me for being... petite. But so are you, yet you look...

case.state: I have spent my life training my blade. A strong body was sure to follow. Yet still I must become sharper.

condition.saying: Um... Laevetein, are you a smoker...? You smell a little like a campfire... it's... weirdly nice?

case.state: O-Oh, all of Muspell's people have that effect on the air. It can be controlled with practice though.
All Muspellians have that effect on the air. A-Although it never flares this high. It must be this game.

condition.saying: ...So... is like... a special soap, or some perfume? It's... I-I want to get some. B-but in another scent. N-not to copy you. Y-your smoke scent...

case.state: Neither. It is a natural part of my body. Unless i gave some piece of my body... you could not obtain it.
It is no scent. I would not know how to imbue a scent onto you. Nor could I give you mine, unless... I gave you a piece of myself.

condition.saying: Um... Laevatein...? Where did... do you think I'd look good in a bodysuit like that? I don't even know how you'd take it off...

case.state: Hmm. A bodysuit is good for keeping armour secure on a frame. It could help someone with a... small statue.
Hmm. If you plan on wearing armour, a bodysuit could help. I could show you how to remove it here.

condition.saying: Oh wow! I just noticed that you're not that naturally perky! It's your bodysuit. I guess it would be kind of fun to have someone tear that off.

case.state: F-Fun? I-I had only considered my bodysuit's combat utility. A-And removing it evoked... something. But was that fun?

condition.saying: Hey! Laevatein! What kind of Idol are you?

case.state: I am no... "idol". I am a warrior of Muspell.
I am no idol, nor have I learned of them. They must not exist in Muspell.

condition.saying: Sorry for the mixup earlier, Laevatein... I'm more surprised you're not an Idol.

case.state: Is it really that odd? I don't think I've done anything... idol like before.
Yes I am. How do you know of Muspell? Do you work with the Order of heroes?
Yes I am. Although I work with the Order of Heroes now. You seem familiar.
Cos-play? I-I don't know what that is. A-A lot of effort did go into my armour's creation though.
I cannot say I know what a "cosplay" is. But this armour has been worth the effort to make it.
I was raised to be nothing more than a lethal tool. But perhaps I can be more.
My father raised me to be nothing more than a weapon. A weapon has no thoughts or feelings
That is what I am here to learn. If I knew how to "lighten up", I would.
H-How can I lighten up? I-I think that's what I am here to learn.
I don't believe I am playing a character. Like I said, I have little experience with "cosplay".
Huh? I'm not playing any character. Even if I wanted to, I would not know how.
W-Well, I train a lot or do various jobs for the Order of Heroes. Although most of those are fighting.
Before, I spent my days training. Although now I must focus on rebuilding Muspell.
Before, I did little more than fight. Now I must focus on "living", for my sister's sake.
Calm down, I'm not going t--- Are you even listening?
Please calm down. I will not hur--- Are you even listening?
Stop. I have no reason to fight you, so I won't.
Stop. What I intend to do has nothing to do with you.
"Character class"...? I am a type of fighter. If that is what you are asking.
A "character class"...? I am a form of soldier, if that is what you were asking.
Th-thank you. My sister used to say something similar. It is odd to hear it from someone else.
O-Oh, my sister used to tell me that. I am... not used to hearing it from someone else.
I don't do much for fun. This... game is a new experience for me.
I... do little "for fun". A-And playing a game like this is a rarity for me.
N-No, I have never tried it. What makes you ask?
No. I have never done blacksmithing. Why do you ask?
I did not wish for it to get this far, now I have no choice but to use this.
(Can I really do this?)
I won't be removing my hairpieces. T-They are too important to me.
A single loss is no cause for concern!
One loss doesn't matter when you're ahead. (But would Laegjarn agree?)
(Must I win to feel? Or simply play...) I must be more cautious.
Iâ€™m still ahead? Prince Alphonse's strategy is working.
I still have time to figure out a plan, this is alright.
I'm still in the lead, maybe I can learn to enjoy this.
Perhaps I was too confident.
B-But that was a good hand!
Will I just be removing my armour? How could that provoke feelings...?
Alright, I'll give it a chance.
I... I feel a little dazed.
You are all very... patient.
I don't understand.
How has it come this far?
(If this goes any further, I may have to remove Laevatein.)
I'll just think of it... like any other order.
Acknowledged. Let us carry o-on!
I'll do what I've been ordered to.
And so it goes, another item removed.
I... feel a little different than last time.
(All these eyes on meâ€¦)
I've returned from greater loses then this!
I-I will fail no more!
There will be no rest for me, it seems.
Were my sister here...this would be different.
This is my own fault. Were I just stronger...
(My head is racing!)
This is all luck anyway!
I should be better! Losing is a weakness!
Don't think this means you've won!
(I must think carefully) these are my last chances.
M-Must I fear failure?
This game seemed so simple at first...
I-I thought I was better than this...
Well O-of course I'm losing! I can't fight without my armour!
At least I still have Laevatein. That's a consolation.
Laegjarn was patient with me. Even when I failed...
I-I am not weak!
It is rare to see a Muspellian laugh in public. They fear others will percieve weakness from it.
You... do not know Muspell. Its people know little joy there.
Ah, So it's similar to how I felt stronger when I fought with my sister, more confident.
When my sister and I would fight together, I felt stronger with her. If my solders could feel the same, then...
I-I apologize. I took it as disrespect against me and my weapon. C-carry on then.
T-True enough, i-it's just... I take my weapon very seriously.
Before, I was a lethal tool, without thought, or feeling. If I am to say I am truly... living I must do both. Or else I'd just be a blade.
Before... I was a tool to execute orders. But tools do not think, nor feel. I must learn to do both if I am to say that I am... truly alive.
Games... I have tried a few on recommendation. Yet, few keep my attention.
Games... I have tried them on the Princess's ord--- request. Yet this game is one of the few to hold my attention
Indeed, it is not uncommon for realms to be named after founding dragons. Perhaps they were once worshiped.
Yes, now that I think about it, many realms share names with founding dragons. Maybe they were worshiped like gods once.
O-Oh, well thank you for the compliment. (I'm pretty sure that was a compliment.)
Th-Thank you, my armour is very important to me. But to be sure, that was a compliment, right?
It appears we are in similar situations then, since I have become Muspell's leader.
It seems your situation is not unlike mine. I have become the leader of Muspell.
Wait, you are a goddess? I find that hard to believe. Although I guess I've never seen a goddess before.
I... suppose it is. But what could I do to change it?
Perhaps... you are right. But could it be changed?
Ah, my armour was designed after a Muspellian raven. It sounds similar to this "Toucannon".
W-What is a "froot loop"? Wouldn't turning fruit into a loop waste most of it?
My fath--- Lord Surtr trained me as a weapon. Feelings would not help me complete my orders.
Yes, feelings offer no benefit for a soldier. Or at least that is what I was taught.
I've seen women like you in the Order of Heroes. How can you fight while being so exposed?
And are you not overexposed? One good strike could kill you.
You would be correct. I fought for Muspell, the kingdom of flames.
Yes, I fought for Muspell. Only the strong survive there.
I-It is? W-Well maybe I didn't give it enough credence,
Me and my weapon share a name. It would be wrong if we did not.
Me and my blade share our name. I would feel uneasy if we ever did not.
Of course it's made of metal. It would not be able to protect me otherwise.
Armour without metal? Does such a thing even exist?
(My own?) Y-You don't have to compliment me so much. M-My sister did most of the work an-anyway.
(It's mine?) You're... um, nice. But my sister did almost everything for me.
Well, mostly sword fighting. But I'd like to learn other styles.
I fight with my sword. Always have.
Of course, I... think I understand. Your crew needed something to keep you stable, and found it in each other.
...Yes, I think I understand. Your mutual bond gives you purpose, and a way forward.
Yes... but if the realm was built on corruption, the battle could be... in vain.
Yes... but if the corruption was a way of life for a realm's people, could change even come to pass?

condition.saying: At least you've got lots of small things you can take off if you don't want to get embarrassed.

case.state: Becoming embarrassed... I have never had that feeling. Perhaps, to become in touch with my emotions, I must.
Hmm, I have never felt embarrassment. Perhaps I need to in order to truly understand emotions.

condition.saying: I know I made a joke about you being hot earlier... but you're actually really cool... Laevatein...

case.state: Was that... admiration? I-I do not know what I have done to earn it. B-But... thank you.
W-Was that... admiration in your voice? I-I don't understand why I've earned it. B-But... thank you.

condition.saying: N-Nevermind! Just accept the compliment! You look great, and I'm just jealous!

case.state: H-have I upset you? I did not intend this. p-perhaps we should move on.

condition.saying: Whoa... uh... nevermind. How does that come up?

case.state: Holding proper conversation still eludes me. I-I apologize if I have said anything... inappropriate.
I-I still lack skill with proper conversations. B-But have I said something that offended?
Yes, they are a similar pink colour. Perhaps that is not the only similarity we share.
Hmm, they are alike in colour. Maybe that isn't the only thing we share.
I-I... of course. W-Would it be weird were my hair not?
I-Is there value in fully shaving? I-If you do it... perhaps I should try it.
W-Was that a compliment? I-I fail to see how hair could bring out my eyes...
Di-Did you mean to compliment me? I-It is lost on me. I don't understand how hair could bring out eyes.

condition.saying: Oh... I see. Do you... sing, then?

case.state: No. Singing has always seemed a frivolity to me. So I have never had any reason to try.
No. I've only focused on becoming sharper, so I never had any reason to attempt it.

condition.saying: Well, I'd still love to hear you sing!

case.state: Would you? Perhaps I lack skill in singing. It would not be worth hearing.
Why? I have never tried singing, so I lack skill with it. The results would not please you.
It was designed after a raven of Muspellian myth. I've never understood why.
Yes, it was designed after a raven, one that brought death apparently. Does it frighten you?
I-I suppose calming down could not hurt. But I do not understand what "wooing a lass" is.
W-Would "wooing a lass" teach me to feel? If so, I could try it. Whatever it is.
Well, I suppose it was not an order. It's just easier for me to think of it that way.
No this is not a "BDSM fetish thing", whatever that is. A... friend suggested I come here, and... I listened.
I don't know what this game will show me. I don't know if I'll learn anything at all.
I can't say what this game will show me, but I hope it works. Are you here for a similar reason, Bernadetta?
It's more. Laevatein's flames burn bright.
It is more than a symbol. The flames that burn on Laevatein are very much real.
Yes. Me and my blade share a name. We shared purposes as well.
Yes. My weapon and I share names. I was meant to be a tool since birth.
Well, I know very little magic, though I could be called a knight now.
Well, my knowledge of magic is small. Fighting with Askr may make me a knight, though.
I have never heard of such... nonsense. Though I know little of forging... magical weapons.
W-What are you saying. I-I don't think I understand
Ah, I'm more adept at using weapons than making them. Laevatein is all I need anyway.
I see. I'm skilled at using weapons, not making them. I only need Laevatein anyway.
Y-You wouldn't mean... n-no, I-I could not answer th-that.
Losing is nothing to be upset about. Tears wonâ€™t put out a fire.
These boots were a gift from my sister... I miss her sometimes.
I-I don't have many chances left after my top...
I-If I must bare it all...Then I will.
I-Is it wrong to strip so brazenly?
R-Right. I lose, I strip.
We share the same purpose as a lethal tool. It makes sense we share the same name.
I-I did not choose to be named this way. Perhaps it was a joke from my father.
Me and my sword are one and the same in purpose. Tools to carry out orders.
A-Alright I suppose it couldn't hurt. (Something in her voice sounded... off.)
I-I don't know about that. Although this game has been entertaining, if not a little jarring. Perhaps that is its appeal.
I-I don't know about that, I have little knowledge about... sexuality. But this game has been interesting, if not a little surprising. Perhaps that is it's appeal.
I had not considered that. You look knowledgable, what would you recommend?
I-It is just I have little experience with them. But you look knowledgable on the topic. What would you recommend?
W-Well, It was not my initial idea. But a game like this is bound to elicit emotion, right?
I-It was a recommendation. But a game like this must bring forth emotion of some kind, I think.
O-Oh, all Muspellians are like that. It can be controlled with practice though.
All of Muspell's people have that effect. My sister taught me to control it though.
I can see your sincerity. Even if I do not fully understand what cosplay is.
Your nation? And which one is that?
Your world's nations? W-What are they like?
No, my fath--- Lord Surtr ruled and my sister would have been after. But both of them are gone now.
No, I was only a fighter before, yet now I am the only one left who can lead. Even if I do not know how.
I... apologize, it is not your responsibility to fix my problems.
I'm sorry... I should not force others to help fix my problems.
That many? Your world must hold immeasurable strength then...
Something that tastes like fruit, but is not? Interesting. (Perhaps I could bring fruit to Muspell with that.)
These "Froot Loops" taste like fruit, but aren't? Than perhaps I could introduce it to Muspell.
Are you sure? I did not know Muspell's creatures were well known enough to have differing names.
Can that be? I did not know that Muspellian creatures were widespread enough to have different names across different realms.
A-And anyway, does it matter what I wear? I'll just be taking it off.
Fighting with Askr has shown me that is true. Yet it is hard to change after so long.
I see your point, yet I do not know how to change.
Were you saying something? Oh... she fainted.
I-It definitely was not. T-This suit is-isn't even meant to be seen!
N-No! It's supposed to help my armour fit better. It-It's not helpful for a game like this!
(Something feeling wrong here.) O-Oh, thank you.
Well, thank you. But I'm confused. Do you want anything from me?
I-I guess I do wear it well. I have a question: Are you looking for something from me?
No, it is more akin to being a soldier. The cost is taken care of.
It's closer to the military variety, so it's funded one way or the other.
Yes... my sister was killed protecting me from my failure. I won't forget her sacrifice.
...my sister died protecting me from my father's anger after I failed. I miss her greatly.
How odd. Seeking war is not a gendered trait. I have met many bloodthirsty women.
Intriguing. Blood lust is not a gendered trait. I have met many female fighters capable of it.
N-No... more like "moo-spell" Sharena made a similar mistake as well.
It is closer to "moo-spell". My friend Sharena made the same mistake the first time too.
As I said, it can only be found in the realm of Muspell, my homeland.
My blade was forged in the realm of Muspell, as was I.

condition.saying: Well, that whole flame theme has you looking hot!

case.state: It is more than looks. My body can burn as hot as the flames of Muspell.
It goes further then my appearance. My blade can be fierce as fire.

condition.saying: (S-so what! Maybe I'm a little jealous!)

case.state: O-Or is there something else on your face now...? Emotions are truly hard to understand
O-Or are you feeling something different now? I-I do not think I will ever understand feelings.

condition.saying: Nn-- I-I'd be really cool if I had a magical sword... b-but what element even is pink, anyway?

case.state: "Magical swords" are not usually tied to an element. When you find one that fits, you will know it.

condition.saying: O-oh... it's... it's also a bodysuit and it's sheer... a-and you are wearing panties... n-not that you wouldn't have any reason you'd not.

case.state: Calm yourself. I am having a hard time understanding you. The bodysuit helps my armour fit. That's all.

condition.saying: Oh my God... your boobs are so... perky! ...Is it part of the costume? O-or... w-wow!

case.state: My... boobs...? N-No, they-they are my own. W-Why must we pay attention to them now?

condition.saying: Well... you certainly have the appearance and style of an Idol! S-sorry for assuming.

case.state: It is alright... Perhaps I could become closer to my emotions from Idols, rather than this... game.
Ah, so idols sing. Perhaps I could learn to feel from being a idol, rather than this... game.

condition.saying: Everyone's got a song worth listening to, you know? I'd love to hear yours!

case.state: Is... is that so? I still do not think it would be worth hearing. But maybe... I could attempt it.

condition.saying: ...Whoa. Is it the bodysuit or is your rack just that good? For a fire princess, that's pretty hot.

case.state: You are... impressed? Th-thank you, I maintain my body... but I've rarely thought of my appearance.

condition.saying: You're a babe down to the finest parts? You'd have made a pretty exceptional Idol on that alone. Or a model. Holy crap.

case.state: I-I... th-thank you. I-t is... odd to feel pride in my appearance. But I do not dislike it.

condition.saying: ...I'm used to stage pyrotechnics, but that was a bit much!

case.state: I... ngh... apologize if I alarmed you. I forgot you are not naturally flame-resistant. I will hold back in the future.
Th-thank you... although I'm fine by myself.
I-I needed to. It was the only way to avoid failure.
Relax. I have no reason to hate you unless you give me one.
Calm down. I have no order to fight you, so I won't
A-And what if you can! M-Must you stare?
This bodysuit is better for fighting than strip poker. Everyone can see that now.
Hmm. Well, thank you for looking away.
You understand? Y-You must be a soldier too then.
You get it? Well, you are a soldier.
You are more knowledgeable than most. Yes, I am the daughter of the flame giant, Surtr.
That is quite a title. Have you done anything to deserve it?
That is an expressive title. What could you have done to deserve it?
I have met some in Askr. Their song is enough to uplift even the most exhausted soldier
I have seen them in Askr. Their song is enough to bring any soldier from the brink of exhaustion.
C-Could you? Getting... ex-excited could help my... situation.
I-Is that possible? Becoming ex-excited could help me learn how to feel...
H-Huh? I-if you are trying to-to be clever, it won't work on me. I-I won't drop my guard that easily!
Y-You were entertained by that? I do not understand you. That i-is far from the usual reaction.
Y-You are a strange one... but perhaps I could take that offer... someday.
You are an o-odd one. But perhaps that offer could help me.... one day.
Th-Thank you... you too... are hot.
Th-thank you... I think you are... hot, as well...
So what if you can see through! T-this doesn't change anything!
Will I get my armour back after the game? I need it to fight.
W--Why are you ogling!? If you're smart, you'd stop...
(Can this really help me learn how to live...to think for myself?)
I'll be lighter without that cloak, although that's not much of a boon playing cards.
(Perhaps calling the flames of Muspell to strip was excessive...)
(My heart's pounding) This is all of me...
If you are a soldier, then you must know proper discipline,
(A military member...Perhaps I could speak to them.)
It isn't uncommon to see men in Muspell with red hair. I am used to it.
A Muspellian general I respect has red hair as well. It is nice to see it.
No flame can burn forever.
Your time is almost up.
Why do you strip? Are you following orders?
Muspellian men wear little clothes due to the heat... Is it not so here?
It is... interesting to see how an outfit is built piece by piece.
I will pay attention. That way, I will not be caught off-gaurd!
Try not to lose it, clothes are important.
Would you care to train later...
This game... It is more generous than I expected.
You... get as many chances as you have clothes? How odd.
(OK, now prepare yourself.)
My blade will keep me c-calm (I hope.)
Y-you better not try anything strange! Okay?
Does losing make you angry?
How do you feel? I am curious, perhaps I could learn.
Are you the type to stay calm under pressure, ~name~?
I don't take failure lightly, ~name~.
You there, in the blue dress. Do you know of a realm named Nfil?
You there, your name is Elsa? If you can control ice, then you must know of Nfil?
The gates were key to the war. Both sides would bring heroes from other worlds to fight for them. Can you bring... people out of your "portals"?
The gates were a key part. Heroes from other worlds were brought through and fought under contract. Can you summon... people though your portals?
Quit complaining and keep your emotions in check, you are not the only one in that position.
You're Stella, right? If you can open gates to other worlds, you must be an Askrn, correct?
Stella, If you can open gates like that, you must be from Askr, right?
(Rinkah looks so similar to her, that it makes me feel so...weird.)
Ah, my sister had a similar hair colour. It is... odd to see it on another.
I've seen brown hair like that in Askr. It appears it is common here as well.
(Does my hair look like that?)
You wouldn't last long in Muspell. Not looking like that, at least.
(I suppose this is a type of training.)
Will I just stare at people's bodies and just...feel? I don't understand.
I hope there are no hard feelings. (I'm pretty sure I said that like how she told me to..)
I-It feels odd to say this... but l-let's carry on.
(How much more of this can I take!?)
I am interested in what you'll take off next.
(Perhaps I could find something like that in Askr.)
For now... I will pay attention, if you do not mind.
Perhaps there is excitement... in seeing what comes off next.
Seeing this from another woman should elict discomfort, but...
Failure isn't something to be taken lightly, ~Name~.
How can two people lose!?
So Princess Sharana was right, even royals play this game.
If someone like you is here, then perhaps it would not be so odd to see Alfonse here as well.
(How can he strip so easily) I-I wasn't staring!
I guess we should move on. N-No reason in particular.
Something small now? I-I am unsure of whether to be upset or happy.
I-I suppose this could be interesting.
~clothing.ifPlural(Those|That)~ ~clothing~ would offer nothing of value in combat. But maybe it has uses elsewhere.
Would you mind... letting me look at that?
Do you usually wear that? Or is it simply for this game.
I will pay attention. I do not want to miss an important detail.
It's still early, you should take off something small...I think.
Just something small? Well... alright.
From what I understand, it is prudent to remove small items.
It isn't strange to wear accessories on a beach...right?
During the time I spent at the beach. I saw many accessories. Seashells were common.
~clothing.ifPlural(Those|That)~ ~clothing~...I wonder how it was made.
I understand you're using a sort of strategy. Doesn't mean I like it.
I had never considered the possibility that clothes could interest me.
There are many different types of clothes here... It is a bit dazing.
If you continue to remove accessories...will you feel anything?
(This isn't getting me any closer to my goal)
That was practical, but not very interesting.
In Muspell, your rank determines how... grand your armour is. Is it not so here?
Men who dress strangely are common in the Order of Heroes. I'm used to it by now.
Is that even clothing? I've never seen a similar style.
Do you feel... relieved after taking that off?
You are a shape shifter? I've had bad experiences with your type.
You're Jason, right? You look like you know how to fight.
Jason, right? That's a nice weapon. Do you use it much?
That is an impressive weapon, does it see much use?
(Were I my sister, would I attempt to deduce what they're going to remove?)
I could be training right now...
Do you normally wear so much? Or is it just for this game?
Do not underestimate even the smallest losses.
I will not miss a single detail.
You don't see many ~clothing.ifPlural(like those|like that)~ in Muspell. Perhaps I could introduce ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~
(Do women wear accessories more than men?)
Oh. So that is how you remove that.
It is common for women in Muspell to wear more armour than males. Is it so here?
W-Why wait until now!?
I-I'm at a loss...I can't figure you out.
(This lady, can she control ice!?)
(Did she say "Flame Tribe"? Perhaps she meant Muspell, yet I have never heard it referred to as such.)
~clothing.ifPlural(Those|That)~ ~clothing~ would offer nothing of value in combat. (So why am I drawn to ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~?)
Maybe I should buy Princess Sharana a hat after this game, is that something f-friends do?
Why even bother? This will end the same.
Stall tactics... Interesting play.
I-If one wanted to acquire something like that--not that I do--how would they go about it?
What influenced you to take off that, I wonder?
You must be feeling lighter now.
Hmm... accessorizing, it's a foreign concept to me. (Maybe they could teach it to me?)
Many women in the Order of Heroes care about their accessories. You would fit right in.
Sharena tried to teach me about the importance of accessories. But I did not understand it.
I'll endure this game for now, but... how long will it go?
Oh..I understand what your plan is (No I don't.)
How much longer now? There are other tasks I must attend to.
(Where would princess Sharana find a place like this?) O-Oh yes, let's move on.
Acknowledged. Try to pace your stripping. Getting cold would be a distraction.
What's to stop someone from stalling with minor bits of clothes? Is there an item limit?
Well, that's a little better, I suppose.
Hurry. Up! Or I could just cut the clothes off you!
This is not what I wanted!
Why are you doing this now,,,
It would be best not to leave your clothes near me. They would end up burned.
Are you playing with a strategy in mind? It's hard to tell.
Is a strategy possible? Or is it all luck? Ugh, Laegjarn would know.
(Was this game supposed to make me angry.)
Hmph! This is ridiculous!
(It would make me feel better to have someone at my level of exposure...)
I need to understand why people play this game. Then I can fulfill my order.
Your weak points are exposed... We'll see how that plays out.
If your clothing is not heat-resistant, I would recommend keeping away from me.
Really!? Must you taunt me!
I am no stranger to working with what I have, but you're not giving me much.
I-It would be better if I had more to work with. So take off something more next time.
A hero, are you? Perhaps you would like to join the Order of Heroes?
You look similar to those in the Order. You must be a hero then.
Your muscles, they are...impressive.
Commander Anna? What are you doing in a place such as this?
(Should I follow their lead?)
I-I may need an example. (I hope they don't perceive that as weakness.)
Do you feel uncomfortable exposing your weak points?
Not a lot, but not a little either. Balanced.
When does this game end? When there's only one winner?
(I cannot miss anything, it could take me further from my goal.)
So you'll remove your ~clothing~?
Small pieces of clothing have their value too.
I would like to know where you got that. F-For no reason in particular.
Is this another scheme to make money?
I'll tolerate this for now (but could there be something better?)
I think I'm starting to get interested in this game.
(Many players, yet only one can win.)
Oh, you stripped. It is not like me to get distracted.
What's your endgame? Everyone should have a reason for what they do.
I think I may have come overdressed, bu-but that's not an issue.
I-Is that heat-resistant? If not you should not leave it near me.
i do not see the point in watching... yet I still wish to do it. How odd.
Odd, it isn't like me to get annoyed.
You have bad timing. It's annoying me.
Is this some sort of attempt at humour? It's not working.
(Maybe something li-like that would suit me.)
Any victory is acceptable
Will this one get me closer to my goal?
I can see... weak points.
(I wonder what's next?)
You won't take off more? Are you sure?
We're getting slightly more interesting now.
Are you not cold like that? Does it not interfere?
I could never fully relax if I removed my sword. I wonder if you feel the same about ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~.
W-Was that important to you?
You should have trained more, maybe it could have helped now.
A step closer to the goal...
You should now realize how exposed you are.
Only one may win. That is how it always has been.
Do not strip so suddenly! I was not ready! D-do so again and I shall cut you down.
E--Explain your intentions! I wi-will not drop my guard that easily!
(Even this small amount is worrying me, why!)
Y-You cast that aside so easily!
(That pink girl. I may be able to ask her about... it.)
(That pink girl. Do you think she would know about... it?)
While it can seem small at the time, all these losses pile up quickly.
I suppose poker is a battle in its own right. It depends on how you percieve it.
A-Are you comfortable like that?
Clothes are not the most interesting subject. (So why am I drawn to them?)
(If nothing else, this game is entertaining) We sh-should keep going.
W-Would someone please explain why we're doing this!?
You're being slow... Hurry up.
(She's not very good at this is she? Although I'm not much better.)
I-I suppose I could look, just a bit, f-for strategic purposes only o-of course.
W-When did you get so skilled at this...
Um, Pinkie Pie. You're a baker right? Would you know anything about... chocolate?
So, Pinkie Pie. If you are a baker, then you must know of chocolate, right?
Is this a wise idea?, You don't have much clothing.
Sharana is my opposite. She does what she wants, when she wants. You're similar to her.
You have such confidence. I am slightly... jealous.
now, we are equal... a fair fight.
When was the last time I felt like this? It has been too long.
After three losses, why haven't you just given up?
I don't get your... tenacity.
Muspell is covered by flames, many wear only what's necessary. So I am used to uncovered skin.
D-Do not think that I will drop my guard at the sight of your revealed skin, ~name~!
So I suppose the normal plan is to start small and go larger.
You'll have to be clever to win now.
You look similar to my sister... she was beautiful.
(Maybe the reason for all this... is just because we can. Is that living?)
T-There is not much left. I-I can see almost everything.
Y-You are so calm... how?
Do not strip so suddenly! I was not ready! D-do so again and I shall cut you down.
I wa-was not ready for this...(Why am I feeling like this!)
... Oh have we moved on? I apologize, I did not notice.
It'd be simpler just to burn the clothes instead of stripping... but it would be damaging in the end, though.
(We're getting closer to the end, am I ready?)
There is still more to come from you, I'm sure.
Your weakest point is now exposed...
Was this what Princess Sharana was talking about? Maybe she's more knowledgeable then I thought.
D--Do not think I'll enjoy this! (Was that convincing?)
Why do I even feel embarrassed? Its so... embarrassing.
What i-is this that am I feeling? It is unlike me.
I am nervous, yet excited at the same time, it is a new feeling.
S-So this should make it easier? Good.
L-Let's keep this going, shall we?
(This is... exciting me.)
(I'm fully dressed and he's getting shirtless?) Can that really be right?
(Couldn't someone just explain this game to me?)
A chest is just a chest...
You look like you could have seen a good few battles.
Looks like an average Muspell soldier.
Oh. You're quite built. Don't infer anything from that!
... That does seem more appropriate for a beach.
When I last went to the beach, many men did not have their shirts on. You'd fit right in.
(Am I still trying to learn? O-Or am I just enjoying this?... Either way I do not dislike this.)
I... u-umm. (Perhaps this isn't so bad.)
W-What is this feeling... it is unfamiliar.
I-I wonder how your... chest would feel against me...
Already!? T-That does not make sense!
Gah! Y-You did that to throw me off my guard, didn't you!?
Did you do that on a whim, or did you plan that!?
(I feel slightly overdressed now.) Carry on...
Despite seeing many chests before, I feel... odd. Perhaps it is the setting.
My sister once said that a man bearing his chest can mean many things.
Walking around half nude isn't uncommon in Muspell, due to the heat you see.
It wasn't rare for soldiers to fight half-nude in Muspell, I...was not a fan.
Not the best, but not the worst either.
I-I will not be distracted so easily!
I guess this is the main attraction of this game, (What do people see in it?)
(I-I don't think I could handle all this attention.)
T-There's anticipation in the air.
I could never get used to this part... Even after seeing countless soldiers nude.
I-Is it time already!? (This is going faster then I thought, I must keep up.
(I know I must be careful with my reaction... but why?)
This i-is said to help, right?
Are you joining me yet? N-No?
Y-You are taking something off? I did not notice.
Let's move on.
Do they vary in size? I hope so...
Hmm...Perhaps it is normal, I do not know.
Weak... and now everyone knows.
There isn't much to say.
D-does it get larger when aroused?---N-not that I want to see it like that o-of course.
Is it...supposed to look like that?
Average... I think that's good, but not impressive.
Oh... so that's what they look like.
Hm, it is not unlike my sword's grip.
(I thought I was ready!) u-umm...
T-That's how they're supposed to look, right ~name~
I-I think I've seen enough, I should j-just look away.
(I must get used to this if I am to fulfill Laegjarn's wish.)
(I'm a bit uncomfortable, but also excited...strange.)
I-It's out... I do not know how to describe what I'm feeling.
I suppose that is as good as any other...
How fi-fitting, for a body like yours.
Desire...is also new to me, but I do not shun it.
It-It's big... D-Did I just say that out loud!
H-How did you hide something so... large!?
(I wonder if Helbindis is that...large.)
It's im-impressive, I won't lie.
A sign of strength, I believe.
You have no shortage of strength, right ~name~ ?
(Do they all look like that!?)
Laegjarn never mentioned anything about this!
I ma-may not be experienced with males, but bigger is usually better, right?
It's just a... penis! Why do I feel so... odd!?
This... feeling! Please remain undressed, so I can become accustomed to it!
Y-You are not planning to... do anything with that, are you?
I... have never understood how...
(Maybe by watching, I can get a better idea of this.)
Surely this cannot make me feel anything, right?
(I think I can tell where this is going.)
Oh, more exposed skin.
You better make your last turns count.
(Why do I feel... anxious about this. It does not make sense.)
I--I don't know how to feel about this.
(Why am I thinking of my sister right now!?)
I-Is what I am feeling curiousness? No, It is something... more.
Just... do it quickly.
Hmmm...have you ever been ridiculed for those?
A smaller chest can be helpful in combat.
I don't have much to go off, but I think those are nice.
(I feel... weird. Is it because of... those?)
I don't know what I was expecting.
I was worried this would feel...weird, but I'm okay.
I was wondering if your clothes were hiding anything. It appears not.
E-Even this makes me feel weird now!
This i-is OK...Y-Yes I'm fine.
W-Why was I anticipating that?
They look similar to my sister's.
(Are my breasts average compared to most Muspellians?)
Average with neither strengths nor weaknesses. Is that a boon or a bane?
T-That's average, right? I've had little experience with this.
That's a good size. Won't get in the way.
Average... like mine.
(She uses magic, and that... chest. Did Loki follow me here!?)
(i can't help but imagine my sister) They l-look nice, I think.
Those must get you some attention. I'm not envious.
I don't think I can get used to this... And I thought nothing could surprise me.
(Is this... jealousy? I do not enjoy this.)
(I want to feel those, even a little.)
There was once a trickster who served my family... she looked much like you.
I don't understand the fascination with a woman's chest. It's just lumps of skin.
Large breasts seem like they could get in the way... of combat.
You can... see mine. It is only fair that I see yours.
I-I feel warmer than usual. You... should back away.
I have never seen a chest so... close up.
Such an... unfamiliar feeling...
W-Would you mind giving me that sword for a while? I-It looks interesting.
I apologize if I have little to say, there is a lot to process.
(I wonder how it would feel...being in her position)
(When did she get so... Attractive?)
I wonder what it looks like.
This is something that I have rarely seen before.
I must get used to what is unfamiliar to me.
(This...excites me?)
This has never happened to me before, but I feel that I am not supposed to see this.
D-Do it fast, I could not take watching this for long!
Oh, you don't shave? Even a little has its benefits you know.
T-That seems unwise if you wish to win, but I don't think that's your goal.
O-Oh...Are you one of those types.
Why was I not warned about this part!? Did she intentionally leave me in the dark?
O-Oh It looks...nice.
How am I supposed to feel... A-Am I?
I have never seen one in such... detail. I do not think I'd mind seeing more.
If you have lost this many times, then perhaps you do not deserve to win.
How many chances do you get!?
I-I won't be unnerved so easily!
Oh, you're back. D-Don't make me worry about you again.
Welcome back. I would appreciate it if I did not have to worry about you again.
Wise words. I can hear your leadership in them.
Those are wise words. You must be a good commander.
He would? Who is this "friend"?
He would? What exactly happened to this friend?
I have trained with many weapons, but I enjoy my sword the most.
I'll always use my sword when I can. We are inseparable.
Yes, me and my blade share our name. We are one and the same.
Indeed, we are both lethal tools. It makes sense we share a name.
... Yes. I have dedicated the rest of my life to change. I must learn how to live for myself.
Yes, I agree. When people follow out of fear... they are little more than weapons.
That is sure. When people follow orders without choice, they become... weapons to be used.
So, Jim. This raiders group you lead. Why do you fight?
You lead a band of raiders right, Jim? What's your purpose.
I'm curious, Jason. Is there... a reason why you fight?
Jason, Is there a reason why you fight and kill?
Muspell was defeated. My sister and Surtr died. I am the only one left to lead.
Askr won and Surtr was defeated, my sister was killed. I am the only one left to rule.
However... I now work to complete the last order she gave me. To live and think for myself...
Yes... I have a goal now. My sister's last order was for me to live for myself. I will achieve that.
H-Have you tried... anything like that, Jason?
Hm, d-do you have... experience with... sexuality, Jason?
It is a harsh and dangerous land. Only the strongest survive there
Muspell is a dangerous land. A person must be strong to survive it.
I cannot tell your gender. It is unclear.
You're not trying to deceive me, are you?
The ground is barren crag and the rivers are made of lava. Nothing can grow there.
The sweltering heat and barren ground means little can survive there.
(I'm glad it's not me.)
(Oh, I have to look now.)
Will this one show me how to feel?
You can take things slowly, if you want to.
Will you do what you are told to?
(Just think of them like soldiers.)
I-I'm feeling something, but I cannot name it.
*Phew* I'm ready for this...
N-Not as strong as you thought you were?
I can... understand that. There are times I wish I could do the same for my sister.
Yes... I think that makes sense to me. I would do the same for my sister.
Apologies, on second glance, you look nothing like them. Yet your powers are similar.
Y-Yes, I can see that now. I-It's just... your powers are similar. The Askrn can open gates as well.
So for you, it was... revenge? I can understand that. But... did you obtain it?
Revenge, was it? I can understand it. In the end, did you get it?
"Used to be"...? And it was your group's strength who changed this... dominion?
You used your... strength, to reform this... "dominion"?
Hmm, when Heroes are summoned, it is as if they are grabbed from another world. I wonder how many would turn away given the choice.
When a Hero is summoned, they are taken from another world. Perhaps many would not fight, given the choice.
I believe it is true though. Many commanders rule through fear alone. By avoiding that, you are wiser than most.
It is true though. It is not uncommon for troops to be commanded through fear alone. By avoiding this, you are stronger than most.
Oh. I see. A-And how has he dealt with his father's... legacy?
Oh, I understand. I-I must ask, how has he grappled with his father's... legacy?
It is hard to say... I would like to bring about a world where strength is not all. Yet I must change myself before I can bring it about.
I think... I would make a world where me and my sister would not have had to fight. One where strength is not all.
Yes... In Muspell, strength is valued above all else. Those who are deemed weak are seen as nothing more then pawns of the strong.
Yes... The law of Muspell is the weak submit to the strong and are disposed of when no longer useful.
W-Well... I don't know to complete my order yet... I'm trying actions that elicit high emotions.
